PreceptDef.label: rejected
PreceptDef.description:
Modern technology is a corrupting force that separates humanity from its natural path. Using it is shameful and leads only to ruin and discord.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effects:</color>
 - Colonists will refuse to equip or wear items that are industrial tech level or higher.
 - Tantrum mental breaks will target items and buildings that are industrial tech level or higher.
